ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Nostrolo tambourine
ygData.msgSnippet: But really -- for the amount of money and time you ll spend -- a walrus skin drum (goes for 1k on Rodcet Nife) might be your best bet.  Walrus skin is a bit
ygData.messageBody:
But really -- for the amount of money and time you'll spend -- a walrus skin drum (goes for 1k on Rodcet Nife) might be your best bet. Walrus skin is a bit better than the tamb and cold hard cash gets it right away -- personally I enjoyed the quest but not everyone in this game does. Just a thought )
"Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@...> wrote: another option is to hunt in dreadlands and /auc for it often. Dreadlands
has a lot of traffic and you should not have any problems buying it. Back
when I got my coins, I bought them all in a couple days of play there. The
money you will be making killing mobs there will pay easily for the cost you
would pay for the coin, instead of hours sitting on your butt camping a
mob... I too use it as backup now as I got a walrus skin this weekend.

Minkin
56 - A ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: January 7, 2002 12:33 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Nostrolo tambourine


There are walkthroughs found readily enough on the usual spoiler sights. I
had no problems with any of these except the Kaesoria. It's ultra random
spawn - so some people get it in 10 minutes - others camp for hours to get
one...

Since I got a Walrus Skin - the Tambo is my backup in the bank for corpse
runs.

Slyde
58 - Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Stephen McCloskey [mailto:s.mccloskey@...]
Sent: Monday, January 07, 2002 10:20 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Nostrolo tambourine

Had a guild party camping the one in Kaesora for about five to six hours.
The mob that drops it only spawned twice and never had the coin. We were
the only people in Kaesora at the time so at least there were enough mobs
to keep us happy. Have had the other five coins in the bank for probably a
year now.
